scale.label: Strongly Agree → Strongly Disagree
scale.value_mapping_note: Map as needed to your scoring system (e.g., SA=5… SD=1).

themes.name: Self-direction (Initiative)
themes.focus: Taking initiative, being proactive, bias toward action

items.text: I am willing to risk failure to reach my goals.
When I work at something, I care about doing my best.
I like coming up with new ways to solve problems.
I take the initiative myself, rather than relying on others
When I set a goal, I immediately start working on it
I make plans that help me accomplish what I aim for.
I expect good things to happen to me.
I am excited about my future.
I trust that my future will turn out well.
My life will make a difference in the world.
I am doing things now that will help me to achieve my purpose in life.
I have long term dreams, and I am taking steps to achieve them

themes.name: Awareness (Relationships and Empathy)
themes.focus: Working with others, empathy, fostering relationships

items.text: I feel bad when someone gets their feelings hurt.
I understand how those close to me feel.
It is important to me to understand how other people feel.
I am happy when others succeed.
I go out of my way to help others.
I help others even if it requires a lot of my time.
I encourage my friends to be the best they can be.
I put in more effort than many of my peers to achieve success.
I see tasks through to completion even when I encounter obstacles.
People can count on me to get tasks done
I always do the things that I say I am going to do
I persist and find ways to overcome challenges even when tasks become difficult.
I find creative ways to overcome challenges when things don't go as planned.
When I face setbacks, I reflect on what went wrong and adjust my approach.
If something interests me, I try to learn more about it.
I use the knowledge I gain at school in my life.
Being a student is central to my identity
I take charge of my own learning.
I care about doing well in school
I always pay attention in class
I always come to class well-prepared
